author: jstrachan
msg: Added a simple new tag to create a sorted Map of Maps of all the goals available in Maven indexed by plugin.
${goals} is a map with key = plugin name and value = map, where its key = name of goal and value = Goal
${goals.java} to get all the goals for the 'java' plugin
This can be handy for things like the console or the new Swing Wizard that I'm half-way through writing with JellySwing...

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Tim Anderson's patch to fix dynamic tag libraries so that inheritence works properly now.

author: rwaldhoff
msg: ignore additional javadoc tags in tag reference stylesheet to clean up docs
